name: HSB_MPI_ID_HX
description: This table includes Identity ID history information for the Episode (HSB) master file.

columns.name: SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: The unique ID assigned to the episode record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for this related response group.

columns.name: MPI_HX_ID
columns.description: The historical MPI ID of the corresponding historical MPI ID type for the record.

columns.name: MPI_HX_INSTANT
columns.description: The date and time the MPI ID was placed on the record's historical ID table.

columns.name: MPI_HX_ID_TYPE
columns.description: The MPI ID type of the historical MPI ID linked to the record.

columns.name: MPI_HX_ID_TYPE_ID_TYPE_NAME
columns.description: The name of the ID Type.

columns.name: MPI_HX_USER_ID
columns.description: The user that performed the audit action on the historical MPI ID.

columns.name: MPI_HX_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: MPI_HX_AUDIT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The action the user performed on the historical MPI ID.

columns.name: MPI_HX_NEW_ID
columns.description: The new MPI ID that was added to the record.

columns.name: MPI_HX_DOTONE
columns.description: The internal ID of the record when the user performed the action.

columns.name: MPI_HX_FROM_DATE
columns.description: The effective from date of the historical MPI ID on the record.

columns.name: MPI_HX_TO_DATE
columns.description: The effective to date of the historical MPI ID on the record.
